text: The Brazilian Confederation of Practical Shooting, Portuguese Confederação Brasileira de Tiro Pratico (CBTP), is the Brazilian association for practical shooting under the International Practical Shooting Confederation.IPSC.org :: Regions In 1996, CBTP hosted the IPSC Handgun World Shoot. == External links == * Official homepage of the Brazilian Confederation of Practical Shooting == References == Category:Regions of the International Practical Shooting Confederation Category:Sports organisations of Brazil
title: Brazilian Confederation of Practical Shooting
